tagline_ru: Сено, пыль и одна лампочка на проводе
scene_en: Weathered wooden barn interior, hay bales stacked against walls, single dusty lightbulb swinging on frayed cord, golden cracks of sunlight through warped planks, cobwebs in corners catching light, worn wooden floor with scattered straw
audio_hints: creaking wood, wind through plank gaps, distant rooster, swinging lightbulb chain clink
lighting: warm amber sunbeams through gaps, dusty particle haze, chiaroscuro from single bulb

tagline_ru: Пар, зеркала, берёзовый веник
scene_en: Old Russian bathhouse interior, fogged mirrors with condensation drips, wooden benches dark from steam, copper ladle on bucket, steam wisps backlit by single window, birch broom hanging on nail, thermometer on wall
audio_hints: water dripping, steam hiss, wood creak, distant well pump
lighting: soft diffused light through fogged window, warm golden backlight through steam

tagline_ru: Банки с вареньем и холодная правда
scene_en: Root cellar with earthen walls, shelves of preserves in glass jars — pickles cucumbers tomatoes jam, bare bulb overhead casting sharp shadows, cool blue-tint air, wooden step ladder, smell-scratched wall where temperature is marked in pencil, musty old carpet
audio_hints: dripping water echo, distant muffled voices from above, jar glass clink, wooden shelf creak
lighting: single bare bulb overhead, cool blue ambient, dramatic shadows on shelves

tagline_ru: Перья, кудахтанье и жёсткий разговор
scene_en: Chicken coop doorway, feathers floating in golden backlight, wooden perch with scratching hens out of focus, scattered grain on dirt floor, rusty wire mesh, egg basket in corner, hand-painted sign with hen count
audio_hints: clucking hens, feather rustle, grain scatter, distant dog bark
lighting: golden backlight through doorway, floating feathers catching light, warm amber

tagline_ru: Подсолнухи, лейка и философия грядок
scene_en: Overgrown garden path, sunflowers towering overhead creating natural canopy, rusty watering can on ground, dappled light through foliage, tomato vines on wooden stakes, garden gloves on fence post, distant scarecrow silhouette
audio_hints: bird song sparrows, wind through foliage, buzzing bees, soil crunch underfoot
lighting: dappled warm-cool mix through sunflower canopy, green-gold foliage reflections on skin

tagline_ru: Пыль, чемоданы и призраки прошлого
scene_en: Dusty attic with exposed rafters, cardboard boxes labeled in faded marker, moth-eaten curtains draped over furniture, slanted skylight beam illuminating dust particles, old suitcase open with photographs spilling, broken rocking chair
audio_hints: roof rain patter, creaking rafters, moth flutter, dust settling whisper, distant wind howl
lighting: single slanted skylight beam, dust particle haze, warm shaft in cool blue surround

tagline_ru: Холодильник гудит, обои отклеиваются, борщ кипит
scene_en: Soviet-era kitchen, peeling floral wallpaper with water stain, humming Saratov fridge with magnets, net curtains filtering amber sunlight, formica table with oilcloth, gas stove with simmering pot, wall clock ticking, radio on windowsill
audio_hints: humming fridge compressor, wall clock tick, distant plumbing gurgle, simmering pot bubble, radio static
lighting: warm amber sunlight through net curtains, fridge interior glow when opened, gas flame blue accent

tagline_ru: Бельё сушится, город гудит, ветер дует
scene_en: Concrete balcony with drying laundry on clotheslines, distant city haze, rusted railing with chipped turquoise paint, potted geranium, overflowing ashtray on plastic chair, view of identical panel buildings, pigeon on railing
audio_hints: distant city hum, car horns, pigeon cooing, clothesline wire creak, wind in laundry
lighting: hazy urban golden hour, soft backlight through drying sheets, pastel sky

tagline_ru: Запотевшие стёкла, помидоры и влажная правда
scene_en: Dacha greenhouse with fogged glass panels, tomato vines heavy with fruit, soil-stained wooden shelves with seedling pots, drip irrigation tubes, thermometer showing 32°C, spider web in corner with morning dew
audio_hints: water drip, glass condensation drip, distant garden bird, plastic rustling in breeze
lighting: diffused warm light through fogged glass, green-tinted ambient, humid haze glow

tagline_ru: Плитка, лампа дневного света и запах борща из-за двери
scene_en: Stairwell landing with beige tile floor, fluorescent tube buzzing overhead with moth circling, dented metal mailboxes, elevator door ajar showing dark shaft, peeling green paint on walls, bicycle chained to railing, smell of cooking from behind doors
audio_hints: fluorescent tube buzz, distant elevator machinery, muffled TV through walls, echo in concrete, door slam floors above
lighting: harsh fluorescent overhead, cool green-white cast, shadows in stairwell corners

tagline_ru: Арбузы горой, крики продавцов, пакеты шуршат
scene_en: Open-air bazaar stall, pyramid of watermelons, striped awning casting colored shadows, plastic bags rustling in breeze, scale with brass weights, price tags hand-written on cardboard, vendor's apron, distant crowd and other stalls
audio_hints: crowd murmur, vendor calls, plastic bag rustle, metal scale clank, distant radio music, fly buzz
lighting: bright daylight filtered through striped awning, colorful shadow patterns, vivid saturated

tagline_ru: Мятные стены, очередь и плакат о гигиене
scene_en: Polyclinic corridor, mint-green walls with scuff marks, wooden bench with worn armrests, numbered doors with frosted glass, faded health poster about handwashing, rubber plant in corner, patient queue number display, distant intercom
audio_hints: fluorescent hum, rubber shoe squeaks on linoleum, distant intercom PA, muffled coughing, door opening-closing
lighting: harsh fluorescent tubes, mint-green wall reflection, clinical white-green palette

tagline_ru: Виниловые сиденья, запотевшие окна, ёлочка на зеркале
scene_en: Marshrutka interior, cracked vinyl seats, steamed windows with finger-drawn smiley, hanging pine air freshener from mirror, driver mirror reflection, payment tray with coins, passengers in background blur, route number on windshield
audio_hints: diesel engine vibration, vinyl seat squeak, air freshener sway, muffled traffic, door pneumatics hiss
lighting: diffused grey daylight through steamed windows, dashboard glow, passing streetlight flicker

tagline_ru: Масло, инструменты, Москвич на вечном ремонте
scene_en: Garage interior, oil-stained concrete floor, tool pegboard with wrenches and hammers, half-disassembled Moskvitch on jacks, bare bulb on extension cord, workbench with vice, calendar with pin-up from 1998, radio playing Vysotsky
audio_hints: metal tool clank, engine tick cooling, radio playing Soviet songs, concrete scrape, oil drip
lighting: single bare bulb on cord, warm amber center pool fading to shadow, oil reflections on concrete

tagline_ru: Голуби, берёзы, аккордеон вдалеке и золотой час
scene_en: Park bench near pond with pigeons pecking breadcrumbs, birch trees with peeling white bark, distant accordion music, golden hour light through leaves, empty beer bottle under bench, babushka feeding ducks in background
audio_hints: pigeon cooing, accordion music distant, wind in birch leaves, children playing far away, water ripple
lighting: golden hour warm light through birch canopy, long shadows on path, backlit leaf edges

tagline_ru: Велосипед, калоши, 8 замков на двери
scene_en: Communal apartment corridor, narrow hallway with multiple doors, bicycle blocking path, shoe rack overflowing with galoshes, coat hooks with 6 different jackets, shared telephone on wall, light switch with 3 labels, electricity meter with exposed wires
audio_hints: multiple TVs through walls, door locks clicking, phone ringing unanswered, distant argument, toilet flush
lighting: dim overhead bulb, light spill from under doors in different colors, warm-cool mix

tagline_ru: Самовар, варенье, скатерть и комары
scene_en: Dacha veranda, wooden railing with peeling white paint, samovar on table with steam rising, jam jars and tea cups, embroidered tablecloth, mosquito coil smoking, view of garden through screen, rocking chair with knitted blanket, cat sleeping on steps
audio_hints: samovar hissing, mosquito buzz, distant lawn mower, wooden rocking chair creak, cat purring
lighting: soft porch light mixed with garden twilight, warm amber from samovar, evening blue sky

tagline_ru: Зеркало, кнопки, 30 секунд правды
scene_en: Old Soviet elevator interior, scratched mirror covering one wall, panel of floor buttons with worn numbers, fluorescent tube behind frosted panel, scratched metal walls with carved initials, rubber floor mat, capacity sign showing 400kg, slight vibration
audio_hints: elevator motor hum, cable tension, metal creak, floor ding muffled, slight rattle
lighting: harsh overhead fluorescent through frosted panel, mirror reflection doubling light, cold white

tagline_ru: Свечи, золотые купола, тишина и мудрость
scene_en: Small village church yard, whitewashed stone walls, golden onion dome catching sunlight, wooden bench under old linden tree, candle stand with flickering votives, gravel path, iron gate half-open, flower bed with marigolds
audio_hints: church bell distant, bird song, gravel crunch, candle flame flicker, wind in linden tree
lighting: soft diffused golden light, dome reflection casting warm glow, dappled shade under tree

tagline_ru: Объявления, чемоданы, вечное ожидание
scene_en: Provincial train station platform, peeling timetable board with hand-corrected times, wooden bench with sleeping passenger, luggage trolley, loudspeaker on pole, tracks stretching to vanishing point, pigeons on platform edge, kiosk with newspapers and pirozhki
audio_hints: distant train horn, loudspeaker announcement crackle, pigeon wings, platform footsteps echo, coffee machine hiss
lighting: overcast diffused light, platform shelter casting long shadows, distant train headlight

tagline_ru: Линолеум, доска объявлений, запах мела
scene_en: Soviet school corridor, brown linoleum floor polished to shine, bulletin board with children's drawings and schedules, trophy cabinet with dusty cups, portrait gallery of teachers on wall, fire extinguisher in red bracket, classroom door with glass panel
audio_hints: distant bell ringing, children's voices muffled, chalk on board, linoleum squeak, echo in corridor
lighting: fluorescent tubes with one flickering, reflected floor shine, institutional cold light

tagline_ru: Стиральные машины гудят, пар и разборки
scene_en: Basement laundry room, row of Soviet washing machines humming and vibrating, concrete floor with drain, clothes hanging on pipes overhead, detergent box on shelf, steamed small window near ceiling, single plastic chair, hand-written schedule on wall
audio_hints: washing machine drum spin, water pipe gurgle, dripping, steam hiss, vibration hum
lighting: harsh overhead fluorescent, steam catching light, small window daylight stripe on wall

tagline_ru: Удочки, термос, тишина и откровенные разговоры
scene_en: Riverbank fishing spot, two folding chairs, fishing rods stuck in mud, thermos and sandwiches on newspaper, bucket with single small fish, reeds swaying, morning mist on water surface, bridge visible in distance, tackle box open
audio_hints: water lapping, reed rustle, distant bird call, fishing line tension, thermos pour, mosquito buzz
lighting: early morning misty golden light on water surface, cool blue mist, warm sun breaking through

tagline_ru: Тишина, оградки, берёзы и настоящие слова
scene_en: Small village cemetery, iron fence around family plot, weathered wooden bench, birch tree with tied ribbon, fresh and faded plastic flowers, overgrown path between plots, distant church spire, autumn leaves on ground
audio_hints: wind in birch, crow call distant, gate creak, absolute silence between sounds, leaves rustling
lighting: overcast soft diffused light, no harsh shadows, muted colors, silver-grey sky

tagline_ru: Очередь, бланки, ручка на цепочке
scene_en: Small post office interior, counter with glass partition and speaking hole, forms in metal holder, pen on chain, queue number dispenser, wanted posters on corkboard, scale for parcels, stack of cardboard boxes, clock showing wrong time
audio_hints: pen on chain clinking, stamp thud, paper rustling, number called, door bell jingle
lighting: mixed fluorescent and window daylight, official institutional light, slightly yellow

tagline_ru: Расписание враёт, лавка холодная, автобус опаздывает
scene_en: Bus stop with Soviet-era concrete shelter, cracked plastic bench, timetable behind scratched glass showing wrong times, cigarette butts on ground, puddle reflecting sky, distant bus approaching, advertisement poster half-torn, graffiti on shelter wall
audio_hints: distant traffic, wind in shelter, bus approaching engine, puddle splash, poster flapping
lighting: overcast grey daylight, shelter casting shadow, wet ground reflections, headlight approach glow

tagline_ru: Витрины с лекарствами, очередь и советы бесплатно
scene_en: Small pharmacy interior, glass display cases with medicine boxes, pharmacist window with small speaking hole, queue of 3-4 people, blood pressure machine in corner, vitamin poster on wall, hand sanitizer dispenser, price tags in tiny font
audio_hints: cash register beep, pill bottles rattle, door chime, quiet murmuring queue, paper bag crinkle
lighting: bright white pharmacy lighting, glass case reflections, clean sterile feel

tagline_ru: Газовая плитка, сушёные травы, банки на полках
scene_en: Tiny dacha kitchen, two-burner gas stove with enamel kettle, dried herb bundles hanging from beam, shelves with glass jars of dried mushrooms and berries, small window with checked curtain, wooden cutting board with bread and knife, cat on windowsill watching birds
audio_hints: kettle warming, gas burner hiss, cat purr, herbs rustling in draft, distant garden sounds
lighting: warm afternoon light through small window, herb shadow patterns, golden amber atmosphere

tagline_ru: Качели скрипят, песочница, ностальгия и споры
scene_en: Soviet-era playground, rusty metal swing set creaking in wind, sandbox with forgotten toy truck, faded painted animals on wooden fence, bench for parents with peeling slats, puddle under slide, distant children's voices from other yard
audio_hints: swing chain creak, distant children, wind, sandbox grit scatter, metal slide vibration
lighting: late afternoon golden light, long swing shadows, warm nostalgic palette

tagline_ru: Верстак, стружка, запах дерева и честный разговор
scene_en: Woodworking workshop, heavy oak workbench with vice, wood shavings on floor, hand tools on pegboard — planes chisels saws, half-finished wooden stool, sawdust in air catching light beam, radio in corner, tea mug with sawdust rim
audio_hints: wood plane scrape, sawdust fall, radio music distant, wood creak, tea sip
lighting: single window beam cutting through sawdust haze, warm wood tones, amber dust particles

tagline_ru: Тележки, ценники, шок у кассы
scene_en: Budget supermarket aisle, fluorescent ceiling grid, metal shelving with price tags in red, shopping cart with few items, promotional end-cap with stacked cans, floor tiles reflecting light, distant cashier beep, other shoppers blurred in background, hand reaching for product on shelf
audio_hints: shopping cart wheel rattle, cashier scanner beep, refrigerator hum, muzak overhead, plastic bag rustle, coin drop
lighting: bright overhead fluorescent grid, product packaging colors reflecting, clinical white with warm product spots

tagline_ru: Ёлочка на зеркале, навигатор врёт, пробка стоит
scene_en: Taxi back seat POV, cracked leather seats, pine air freshener swinging from mirror, GPS navigator on dashboard showing traffic jam in red, driver's eyes in rearview mirror, rain drops on side window with city lights bokeh, meter running on dashboard
audio_hints: engine idle, rain on roof, turn signal tick, navigator voice muffled, windshield wiper rhythm, distant horn
lighting: mixed — dashboard glow warm, city lights through rain creating bokeh, passing streetlamp sweep across interior

tagline_ru: Талончик, электронная очередь, бюрократия во плоти
scene_en: MFC government services center, electronic queue display showing number 347 current serving 289, rows of plastic chairs half-occupied, information terminal with touchscreen, potted ficus in corner, water cooler, stack of forms on counter, bored security guard
audio_hints: electronic number ding, printer whir, distant typing, water cooler bubble, chair scrape, PA system call
lighting: bright modern LED panels, clean white institutional light, blue accent from screens

tagline_ru: Индукция, кофемашина, минимализм и максимум драмы
scene_en: Modern apartment kitchen, white IKEA cabinets, induction cooktop with glowing ring, espresso machine with steam, marble-pattern countertop, phone charging on counter, smart speaker with LED ring, window showing evening city skyline, single orchid on windowsill
audio_hints: espresso machine steam, induction cooktop hum, phone notification ding, smart speaker ambient, fridge compressor cycle
lighting: under-cabinet LED strip warm white, evening city glow through window, espresso machine indicator lights

tagline_ru: Эскалатор, гул поезда, толпа и правда в лицо
scene_en: Moscow metro station platform, marble columns and ornate ceiling, crowd waiting at platform edge, approaching train headlight in tunnel, mosaic panel on wall, clock showing rush hour, wind from tunnel blowing hair, bench with tired commuter
audio_hints: approaching train roar and wind, PA announcement echo, crowd murmur, turnstile beep, escalator hum, train doors pneumatic hiss
lighting: warm chandelier overhead mixed with cold tunnel draft light, train headlight approaching, marble reflections

tagline_ru: Зеркала, фен, сплетни и откровения
scene_en: Small neighborhood hair salon, wall of mirrors with styling stations, hair dryer on hook, scattered hair clips and bobby pins, magazine rack with glossy covers, shampoo bottles on shelf, client cape draped over chair, calendar with appointments in pencil
audio_hints: hair dryer distant, scissors snip, water spray, radio pop music, chair hydraulic pump, gossip murmur
lighting: mirror-reflected overhead spots creating bright even face light, warm salon ambiance

tagline_ru: Капельница, тумбочка, тишина и честность
scene_en: Hospital ward, metal bed frame with thin mattress, IV drip stand with bag, bedside table with water glass and pills, window with vertical blinds half-open, heart monitor beeping green line, get-well cards on windowsill, white curtain partition
audio_hints: heart monitor beep steady, IV drip, distant nurse footsteps, PA system page, ventilation hum, curtain rustle
lighting: clinical overhead fluorescent, window blind stripe pattern on bed, monitor green glow accent

tagline_ru: Ведро, цепь, деревенская площадь и разговоры
scene_en: Village well with wooden frame and shingled roof, chain and bucket, worn stone rim with moss, puddle around base, wooden bench nearby, view of village houses with smoke from chimneys, dirt road, stacked firewood against fence
audio_hints: chain clink, water splash echo in well, bucket creak, distant dog bark, rooster, wind in grass
lighting: open sky overhead, warm afternoon sun, well shadow creating dark circle, village golden light

tagline_ru: Мониторы светятся, клавиши стучат, энергетик на столе
scene_en: Internet cafe / gaming club, row of monitors with colored screen glow, mechanical keyboard, energy drink can, headphones on desk, LED strip under desk in purple, mouse pad with anime print, cable management chaos, AC unit humming, dark room lit only by screens
audio_hints: mechanical keyboard clatter, mouse click, game sound effects muffled, AC hum, energy drink can crack, chair wheel roll
lighting: monitor screen glow in blue-purple, LED strip accent, dark ambient with colored light pools on faces

tagline_ru: Пиво, вобла, полотенца и мужские разговоры
scene_en: Banya anteroom (predbannik), wooden bench with towels, beer bottles and dried fish (vobla) on newspaper, felt hats hanging on hooks, thermometer on wall, steam escaping from banya door, wooden bucket with ladle, sandals on floor, small window fogged
audio_hints: steam burst when door opens, beer bottle clink, newspaper crinkle, wooden bench creak, distant water splash
lighting: warm overhead bulb, steam diffusion, amber beer bottle glow, cozy dim warmth

tagline_ru: Антенны, закат, город внизу и разговор по душам
scene_en: Apartment building rooftop, TV antennas and satellite dishes, concrete ledge with city panorama, sunset painting sky orange-pink, ventilation shaft humming, pigeon coop in corner, graffiti on water tank, two plastic chairs and overturned crate as table, cigarette butts
audio_hints: wind at height, distant city traffic hum, pigeon flutter, antenna wire whistle, ventilation shaft drone
lighting: golden hour sunset horizontal light, long shadows from antennas, warm orange on faces, cool blue shadow side

tagline_ru: Ступеньки, кот, семечки и вечерний разговор
scene_en: Village house wooden porch, three worn steps, cat sleeping on top step, sunflower seed shells scattered, wooden railing with chipped blue paint, view of dirt road and neighbor's fence, evening sky with first stars, kerosene lamp on windowsill, boots by door
audio_hints: cricket chirp, distant dog bark, cat purr, seed shell crack, wooden step creak, evening bird song fading
lighting: warm kerosene lamp glow from window, deep blue evening sky, first stars, warm-cool transition

tagline_ru: Рога искрят, окна дребезжат, бабушка с сумкой
scene_en: Old trolleybus interior, worn blue vinyl seats with metal frames, overhead handrails with leather straps, fogged windows with city passing outside, driver cabin with mirror, route map above door, elderly woman with heavy shopping bag, floor vibrating on tracks
audio_hints: electric motor whine, overhead wire spark crackle, window rattle, pneumatic door hiss, ticket validator beep, floor vibration
lighting: grey overcast daylight through large windows, interior fluorescent tube, passing building shadows sweeping across seats

tagline_ru: Лопаты, грабли, банки и секретные разговоры
scene_en: Small garden shed interior, tools hanging on nails — shovels rakes hoes, shelf with paint cans and turpentine, cobweb in corner with spider, single dirty window letting in stripe of light, wheelbarrow blocking path, seed packets pinned to wall, mouse trap on floor
audio_hints: mouse scurry, tool handle knock, wind through gap, cobweb brush, distant lawn mower, wood creak
lighting: single dirty window stripe cutting through dark interior, dust particles in beam, dark corners

tagline_ru: Песок, зонтики, крики детей и загар
scene_en: Crowded public beach, sand with footprints and scattered towels, striped beach umbrella casting shadow, plastic lounge chair, cooler box with condensation, sunscreen bottle, distant swimmers in turquoise water, lifeguard tower, seagulls overhead
audio_hints: waves lapping, children screaming, seagull cry, distant music from speaker, ice cream vendor bell, sand crunch
lighting: bright midday sun overhead, umbrella shadow with warm sand bounce, water reflections dancing on skin

tagline_ru: Волны, оранжевое небо, босые ноги и откровенность
scene_en: Empty beach at golden hour, wet sand reflecting orange sky, gentle waves rolling in, two pairs of shoes left on dry sand, driftwood log as seat, distant pier silhouette, single sailboat on horizon, footprints leading to water
audio_hints: gentle wave rhythm, distant seagull, wind in dune grass, wet sand squelch, shell clink
lighting: golden hour horizontal light from setting sun, long shadows on wet sand, warm orange on faces, cool blue ocean

tagline_ru: Лодки качаются, верёвки скрипят, рыба пахнет
scene_en: Wooden fishing pier, weathered planks with gaps showing water below, moored fishing boats rocking, coiled rope on bollard, fish crates stacked, seagull perched on post, distant lighthouse, fishing nets drying on rack, bait bucket
audio_hints: boat hull knock against pier, rope creak, water slap, seagull cry, distant boat engine, wood plank creak underfoot
lighting: overcast marine light, silver water reflections, cool blue-grey palette with warm wood tones

tagline_ru: Мороженое, фонари, прогулка и споры
scene_en: Seaside boardwalk promenade, string lights overhead, ice cream kiosk with neon sign, palm trees in planters, metal railing overlooking dark water, couples walking in background, wet pavement reflecting lights, bench with sea view, distant ferris wheel glow
audio_hints: wave crash below, string lights buzz, distant music, footsteps on boardwalk, ice cream vendor, laughter
lighting: warm string lights overhead, neon kiosk glow, cool ocean darkness beyond railing, mixed warm-cool

tagline_ru: Полотенца, песок на полу, крем от загара
scene_en: Beach changing cabana, wooden walls with peeling blue paint, sandy floor, towel hanging on hook, flip-flops, sunscreen bottle on shelf, swimsuit dripping, small mirror on wall, stripe of bright sunlight through door gap, beach sounds muffled
audio_hints: muffled waves, sand grit underfoot, towel snap, door latch rattle, distant beach sounds filtered
lighting: dim interior with bright stripe of sunlight through door gap, blue-painted wood reflecting cool tones

tagline_ru: Железо, зеркала, пот и мотивация
scene_en: Gym weight room, rack of dumbbells ascending in size, large wall mirror with smudges, rubber floor mats, barbell on bench press, chalk dust in air, water bottle on floor, motivational poster on wall, ceiling fan spinning, sweat towel draped on equipment
audio_hints: weight plates clank, grunting effort, fan hum, rubber mat thud, water bottle squeeze, distant music beat
lighting: bright overhead fluorescent mixed with mirror reflections, chalk dust catching light, harsh gym lighting

tagline_ru: Груша, перчатки, пот и правда в лицо
scene_en: Boxing gym, heavy bag hanging from chain, speed bag on platform, worn canvas ring in background with ropes, boxing gloves on hook, hand wraps scattered, spit bucket in corner, timer clock on wall, fight posters peeling, concrete floor with rubber mats
audio_hints: heavy bag thud, speed bag rhythm, timer bell ding, rope skip, breathing heavy, shoe squeak on mat
lighting: industrial overhead lights, harsh shadows from hanging bags, warm amber from high windows, gritty atmosphere

tagline_ru: Коврики, благовония, тишина и внутренний конфликт
scene_en: Yoga studio, bamboo floor with rolled mats, incense stick smoking in holder, large window with sheer curtain, meditation cushions stacked, wall mirror, small Buddha statue on shelf, essential oil diffuser with mist, plants in macrame hangers
audio_hints: incense crackle, distant singing bowl, soft breathing, fabric rustle on mat, diffuser mist hum, wind chime
lighting: soft diffused daylight through sheer curtains, warm incense smoke catching light, peaceful golden glow

tagline_ru: Хлорка, дорожки, шапочки и мокрые разборки
scene_en: Indoor swimming pool, turquoise water with lane dividers, tiled walls with condensation, starting blocks at pool edge, lifeguard chair, clock on wall, swim caps and goggles on bench, wet footprints on tile, chlorine haze in air, echo chamber acoustics
audio_hints: water splash echo, whistle blast, swimmer breathing, tile footstep echo, ventilation hum, lane rope clink
lighting: overhead industrial lights reflecting off water surface, dancing caustic light patterns on walls and ceiling, turquoise water glow

tagline_ru: Лёд, музыка, падения и смех
scene_en: Indoor ice rink, smooth ice surface with skate marks, boards with scratches, rental skate counter in background, bench for lacing up, disco ball overhead, colored lights sweeping across ice, hot chocolate kiosk, foggy breath in cold air
audio_hints: blade scrape on ice, pop music echo, laughter, thud of fall, skate lace pull, hot drink machine hiss
lighting: colored disco lights sweeping across ice, cool blue ambient, warm spots at kiosk, breath fog catching light

tagline_ru: Мяч стучит, кеды скрипят, район решает
scene_en: Outdoor basketball court, cracked asphalt with faded lines, rusty hoop with chain net, graffiti on backboard, bench with water bottles, chain-link fence around court, evening streetlight casting long shadows, sneakers hanging from wire overhead
audio_hints: basketball bounce echo, sneaker squeak, chain net rattle, distant traffic, fence rattle, breathing heavy
lighting: evening streetlight casting harsh pools of light, long shadows on court, warm sodium lamp glow, urban night

tagline_ru: Пустые ряды, эхо, поле внизу и большие разговоры
scene_en: Empty stadium stands, rows of plastic seats in team colors, concrete steps, metal railing, green football pitch below, floodlight towers, scoreboard showing 0-0, scattered paper cups and ticket stubs, wind whipping through empty rows
audio_hints: wind whistling through empty stands, distant groundskeeper mower, flag flapping, metal seat clank, echo of voices

tagline_ru: Латте-арт, ноутбуки, Wi-Fi и разговоры
scene_en: Hipster coffee shop, exposed brick wall, wooden tables with laptop users, espresso machine hissing steam, chalkboard menu with prices, hanging Edison bulbs, barista in apron, pastry display case, potted monstera plant, vinyl records on shelf
audio_hints: espresso machine steam, milk frother whir, cup clink on saucer, keyboard typing, indie music low, door bell jingle
lighting: warm Edison bulb glow, natural light from large window, espresso machine chrome reflections, cozy amber

tagline_ru: Подносы, кетчуп, очередь и калории
scene_en: Fast food restaurant interior, plastic tray with burger and fries, ketchup packets torn open, paper cup with straw, laminated menu board with photos overhead, tile floor sticky, plastic booth seats, queue at counter, promotional standee, napkin dispenser
audio_hints: fryer sizzle, order number called, tray slide, straw slurp, cash register beep, crowd murmur, ice machine
